name: minelev-pifu-tools
description: Tools for converting data from ViS to tjommi

scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.extract:all: npm run extract:grep && npm run extract:local
scripts.extract:local: npm run extract:groups:skoler && npm run extract:groups:basisgrupper && npm run extract:groups:undervisningsgrupper && npm run extract:groups:kontaktlarergrupper && npm run extract:groups:utdanningsprogrammer && npm run link:groups:utdanningsprogrammer && npm run merge:groups && npm run extract:persons:students && npm run extract:persons:teachers && npm run extract:export && npm run add:extras && npm run add:export:timestamps
scripts.start: npm run vis:files && npm run extract:all && npm run export:delta
scripts.start:extract: npm run vis:files && npm run extract:all
scripts.start:full: npm run vis:files && npm run extract:all && npm run export:full
scripts.start:full:rename: npm run vis:files && npm run extract:all && npm run export:full:rename
scripts.start:full:local: npm run vis:files && npm run extract:local && npm run export:full

author: Geir Gåsodden <geir.gasodden@pythonia.no> (https://github.com/zrrrzzt)
